tr_quotes.quote: Yıllar onu bilge kılmadan önce bir kalbin bu kadar sık kırılması ne tuhaf.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kırık kalp, zor kendine gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Aşkın gözü kördür ama kırık bir kalp her şeyi görür
tr_quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

tr_quotes.quote: Kırık bir kalptense kırık bir kolum olmasını tercih ederim
tr_quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp, çalışan tek kırık enstrümandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kırıldığında bir kalbin parçalanması, gelmiş geçmiş en gürültülü sessizliktir
tr_quotes.author: Carroll BryantNeden

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan odun değil ki; kırıldığı zaman ses çıkarsın.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbini kırıyor diye üzülme, belki de hak etmediği yerden çıkmaya çalışıyordur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kalbinden daha büyük çöl, insanın kalbinden daha derin göl var mı ki? Yangın da burada, yağmur da.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kırgınlıklar geçer elbet dargınlıklar biter elbet. Seviyorum derken gözlerinin içi gülüyorsa her şey unutulmuş demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatı kendine mendil edersen senden gözyaşı ister.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece ben değil, hayallerim de sana kırgın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal kurmanın sonu genellikle hayal kırıklığıyla bitiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalpte kemik yok ama en çok kırılan yer orası!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nur içinde yat kalbim, ben katilini çok sevdim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman bir hayal kursam ertesi gün kırıklarını topluyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Artık gelme. Çünkü hayallerim bile sana kırgın!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kızgınlık çok gürültülüdür, oysa kırgınlık ne kadar sessiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim kalbimi kırdıysan, dünyayı feth etsen bile umurumda değil.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp deniz, dil kıyıdır. Denizde ne varsa kıyıya o vurur.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Bir zamanlar yüzümdeki tebessümün sebebiydin oysa şimdi gözyaşlarımın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Matematiğim o kadar kötü ki hayal kırıklarımı hiç toplayamadım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acı seni daha güçlü yapar. Korku seni daha cesur. Kırık bir kalp ise seni daha akıllı yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: İki kelime yetiyor seven kalbi kırmaya. Sonra roman yazsan ne fayda.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Beni kırmaktan nefret ettiğini söyleyenler, parçalarken zevk mi aldı merak ediyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kırdığın kalbin sahibine iyi bak, yolun bir gün muhakkak ona çıkacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir gün gözlerimde gözlerini göremezsem işte o zaman bu seni seven kalbim kırılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şimdiki kalplerde öyle kırgınlıklar var ki japon yapıştırıcısı bile düzeltemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akan bir suyun önüne durulması ne kadar zor ise, kırılın bir kalbin onarılması da o kadar zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp kolay kolay kırılmaz ama kırıldı mı da onu tamir edecek ustası bulunmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman kalp kıran arkadaş, ayakkabı içindeki taşa benzer.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbini kırıyor diye üzülme; belki de hak etmediği yerden çıkmaya çalışıyordur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kopan gülün dalında durması ne kadar zorsa, kırılan kalbinde onarılması o kadar zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuzda kırılacak 206 tane kemiğiniz varken, aptalın biri gelir kalbinizi kırar.
tr_quotes.author: MarIynn Longston

tr_quotes.quote: Cam ile kalp arasındaki fark cam kırılırsa yenisi alınır ama kalp kırılırsa alınmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Az söyledim, dikkat ettim kalbini kırmamaya; bilirim üzülürsün, yoksa çözüm yoktur sana.
tr_quotes.author: İmam Rabbani

tr_quotes.quote: Dün kalbini kırdığın kişinin, Bu gün öldüğünü duysan, ama ben haklıydım tesellisi avutur muydu seni?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kalbinden daha büyük çöl, insanın kalbinden daha derin göl var mı ki? Yangın da burada, yağmur da.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer birisi kalbini kırmışsa ona karşı sessiz kal, sessizliğinden kalbini kırdıysa anlamışsa boş ver onun onsuz kal.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Özür dilemek de basittir, kalp kırmak da. Ancak ikisi arasındaki enerji çok farklıdır; birisi fetheder, irisi zulmeder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp bir bahçe gibidir. Onda mutlaka bir şeyler bitecektir. O halde güzel şeyler ekin ki güzel şeyler bitsin.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Can ve gönül de yani kalpte hakikat coşkunluklarını kaldıracak takat, kulakta da bunu işitecek istidad yoksa ben kime ne söyleyeyim?
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Kırılmış bir kalbin hesabı bu dünyaya ağır gelir...
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Az söyledim, dikkat ettim kalbini kırmamaya; bilirim üzülürsün, yoksa çözüm yoktur sana.
tr_quotes.author: İmam Rabbani

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kızgınlığı, küskünlüğü elbet bir gün geçer, geçer de kırgınlığı asla geçmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalp kırıklığı öyle birşey. Kırıldığı yetmez, sağa sola saçılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Heartbreak is funny to everyone but the heartbroken.
en_quotes.author: Jeffery Eugenides

en_quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

en_quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
en_quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

en_quotes.quote: Don’t you ever break someone’s heart, because they only have one. Break their bones, they have 206 of those!
en_quotes.author: Jayy Von Monroe

en_quotes.quote: I’ve been heartbroken. I’ve broken hearts. That’s part of life, and its part of figuring out who you are so you can find the right partner.
en_quotes.author: Heidi Klum

en_quotes.quote: Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don’t.
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
en_quotes.author: William Faulkner

en_quotes.quote: Love is the hardest drug to quit, but it is even harder when it is taken away.
en_quotes.author: Ashleyy

en_quotes.quote: There are many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream — whatever that dream might be.
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.
en_quotes.author: Alphonse de Lamartine

en_quotes.quote: Then his heart, now broken into a thousand pieces, slowly began to turn to ice.
en_quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes, Falling Kingdoms

en_quotes.quote: There will be a time when you are forced to follow your heart away from someone you love.
en_quotes.author: Ashley Lorenzana

en_quotes.quote: Has someone made you heartbroken? Then, why are you still thinking of him?
en_quotes.author: Debra K. Messer

en_quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
en_quotes.author: The Tinman, The Wizard of Oz

en_quotes.quote: When your heart is broken, you plant seeds in the cracks and you pray for rain.
en_quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

en_quotes.quote: I wish I were a little girl again, because skinned knees are easier to fix than broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Julia Roberts

en_quotes.quote: I’m not supposed to miss you, I’m not supposed to care.
en_quotes.author: Debra Cox

en_quotes.quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
en_quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the china shop; love is the bull.
en_quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
en_quotes.author: Gregory Roberts

en_quotes.quote: You flew off with the wings of my heart and left me flightless.
en_quotes.author: Stelle Atwater

en_quotes.quote: We are all Romeos looking for our Juliet, but never finding her.
en_quotes.author: Rae Hacton

en_quotes.quote: No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn’t stop for your grief.
en_quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

en_quotes.quote: Loving you was like going to war; I never came back the same.
en_quotes.author: Warsan Shire

en_quotes.quote: Why did I always end up loving the person who hurt me the most? Why was love so cruel?
en_quotes.author: J.C. Reed

en_quotes.quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
en_quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

en_quotes.quote: Hearts are breakable,’ Isabelle said. ‘And I think even when you heal, you’re never what you were before.
en_quotes.author: Cassandra Clare, City of Fallen Angels

en_quotes.quote: When trees burn, they leave the smell of heartbreak in the air.
en_quotes.author: Jodi Thomas

en_quotes.quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: I have lost and loved and won and cried myself to the person I am today.
en_quotes.author: Charlotte Ericksson

en_quotes.quote: There were many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts being broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream-whatever that dream might be.
en_quotes.author: Pearl Buck

en_quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
en_quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

en_quotes.quote: I mean, at the end of the day, what the hell does it matter who I end up with if it can’t be you?
en_quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma

en_quotes.quote: What is the opposite of two? A lonely me, a lonely you.
en_quotes.author: Richard Wilbur

en_quotes.quote: Hands that never touch. Lips that never meet. The Almost Lovers, never to be.
en_quotes.author: Rae Hachton

en_quotes.quote: I never wanted but your heart–that gone, you have nothing more to give.
en_quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes a little heartbreak is a lesson, and the best thing to do is just learn the lesson.
en_quotes.author: Jon Voight

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes… Sometimes our hearts…crack a little.
en_quotes.author: Brodi Ashton

en_quotes.quote: You find out what you are made of when you have a broken heart. If it happens early and often, all the better.
en_quotes.author: Isabel Gillies

en_quotes.quote: There are a million ways to lose someone you love.
en_quotes.author: Tamara Webber

en_quotes.quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn’t stop for your grief.
en_quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the only way the good Lord can get into some hearts is to break them.
en_quotes.author: Fulton Sheen

en_quotes.quote: You can’t give your heart to a wild thing.
en_quotes.author: Truman Capote

en_quotes.quote: For my part, I prefer my heart to be broken. It is so lovely, dawn-kaleidoscopic within the crack.
en_quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: You can’t give your heart to a wild thing.
en_quotes.author: Truman Capote

en_quotes.quote: For my part, I prefer my heart to be broken. It is so lovely, dawn-kaleidoscopic within the crack.
en_quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise.
en_quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

en_quotes.quote: When your heart is broken, you plant seeds in the cracks and you pray for rain.
en_quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

en_quotes.quote: It’s funny how artistic we become when our hearts are broken.
I wish I were a little girl again because skinned knees are easier to fix than a broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Julia Roberts

en_quotes.quote: When you go through heartbreak, you just do the things that get you by. Eventually, you realize it’s about making the most of life.
en_quotes.author: Britney Spears

en_quotes.quote: The human heart has a way of making itself large again even after it’s been broken into a million pieces.
en_quotes.author: Robert James Waller

en_quotes.quote: Human hearts are elastic. They have room for all sorts of passions, and they can break and heal and love again and again.
en_quotes.author: Jodi Lynn Anderson

en_quotes.quote: A broken heart is what makes life so wonderful five years later, when you see that special guy in an elevator and he is fat and smoking and saying ‘Long time no see.’
en_quotes.author: Phyllis Batelle

en_quotes.quote: Pain makes you stronger, fear makes you braver, heartbreak makes you wiser.
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: The best way to heal a broken heart, it turns out, is to find a way to move past the hurt.
en_quotes.author: Mary Kay Andrews

en_quotes.quote: So here’s the thing with broken hearts. No matter how you try, the pieces never fit the way they did before.
en_quotes.author: Ariana

en_quotes.quote: You don’t die from a broken heart. You only wish you did.
God can heal a broken heart, but He has to have all the pieces.
You may have a broken heart, but you may find someone else.
en_quotes.author: Douglas Booth

en_quotes.quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment. Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise.
en_quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

en_quotes.quote: Only time can heal your broken heart. Just as only time can heal his broken arms and legs.
en_quotes.author: Miss Piggy

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps someday I’ll crawl back home, beaten, defeated. But not as long as I can make stories out of my heartbreak, beauty out of sorrow.
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The cure for a broken heart is simple, my lady. A hot bath and a good night’s sleep.
en_quotes.author: Margaret George

en_quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
en_quotes.author: Tin Man

en_quotes.quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
en_quotes.author: William Faulkner

en_quotes.quote: I’d rather have a broken arm than a broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

en_quotes.quote: It’s hard asking someone with a broken heart to fall in love again.
en_quotes.author: Eric Kripke

en_quotes.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
en_quotes.author: J.S.B. Morse

en_quotes.quote: Doctoring her seemed to her as absurd as putting together the pieces of a broken vase. Her heart was broken. Why would they try to cure her with pills and powders?
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities
en_quotes.author: Patti Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Sharp are the arrows of a broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

en_quotes.quote: This time I wouldn’t forget him, because I couldn’t ever forgive him—for breaking my heart twice.
en_quotes.author: James Patterson

en_quotes.quote: I’ve been heartbroken. I’ve broken hearts. That’s part of life, and it’s part of figuring out who you are so you can find the right partner.
en_quotes.author: Heidi Klum

en_quotes.quote: Heaven doesn’t ignore cries of a broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Toba Beta

en_quotes.quote: If all hearts were open and all desires known — as they would be if people showed their souls — how many gapings, sighings, clenched fists, knotted brows, broad grins, and red eyes should we see in the market place!
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

en_quotes.quote: Let go. Why do you cling to pain? There is nothing you can do about the wrongs of yesterday. It is not yours to judge. Why hold on to the very thing which keeps you from hope and love?
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: There are many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream — whatever that dream might be.
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: I wish I were a little girl again because skinned knees are easier to fix than a broken heart.
en_quotes.author: Julia Roberts

en_quotes.quote: One day you’re going to remember me and how much I loved you…then you’re gonna hate yourself for letting me go.
en_quotes.author: Aubrey Drake Graham

en_quotes.quote: Don’t cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won’t let you see the star
en_quotes.author: Violeta Parra

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake and help us see we are worth so much more than we’re settling for.
en_quotes.author: Mandy Hale

en_quotes.quote: I’d rather love a million times and have my heart broken every time, than hold a permanently empty heart forever.
en_quotes.author: H.C. Paye

en_quotes.quote: So it’s true when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
en_quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

en_quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
en_quotes.author: Richard Puz

en_quotes.quote: A broken heart bleeds tears.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: The shattering of a heart when being broken is the loudest quiet ever.
en_quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

en_quotes.quote: A broken heart in real life isn’t half as dreadful as it is in books. […] It takes spells of aching and gives you a sleepless night now and then, but between times it lets you enjoy life and dreams as if there were nothing the matter with it.
en_quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

en_quotes.quote: Love is the most beautiful of dreams and the worst of nightmares.
en_quotes.author: Aman Jassal

en_quotes.quote: The clouds wept when my heart sang a song of sorrow.
en_quotes.author: Sonya Watson

en_quotes.quote: With time the pain eases, the body recovers and the brain figures out new ways to go on.
en_quotes.author: Federico Chini

en_quotes.quote: I know my heart will never be the same but I’m telling myself I’ll be okay.
en_quotes.author: Sara Evans

en_quotes.quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.
en_quotes.author: Christina Westover

en_quotes.quote: Must I go bound while you go free, must I love a man who doesn’t love me, must I be born with so little art, as to love a man who’ll break my heart?
en_quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

en_quotes.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you’d been before the fall.
en_quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

en_quotes.quote: Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.
en_quotes.author: Alysha Speer

en_quotes.quote: I miss you in waves and tonight I’m drowning. You left me fending for my life and it feels like you’re the only one who can bring me back to the shore alive.
en_quotes.author: Denice Envall

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken, it can rarely be put back together in exactly the same way.
en_quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

en_quotes.quote: Don’t feel sad over someone who gave up on you, feel sorry for them because they gave up on someone who would have never given up on them.
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to unfollow people in real life.
The worst pain in the world goes beyond the physical. Even further beyond any other emotional pain one can feel. It is the betrayal of a friend.
en_quotes.author: Heather Brewer

en_quotes.quote: Somebody asked me if I knew you. A million memories flash through my mind, but I just smiled and said I used to.
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
en_quotes.author: Saint Jerome

en_quotes.quote: The most painful goodbyes are the ones that are left unsaid and never explained.
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Harnisch

en_quotes.quote: She took a step and didn’t want to take any more, but she did.
en_quotes.author: Markus Zusak

en_quotes.quote: I know my heart will never be the same, but I’m telling myself I’ll be okay.
en_quotes.author: Sara Evans

en_quotes.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: So here’s the thing with broken hearts. No matter how you try, the pieces never fit the way they did before.
en_quotes.author: Arianapoetess

en_quotes.quote: It’s hard asking someone with a broken heart to fall in love again.
en_quotes.author: Eric Kripke

en_quotes.quote: A heartbreak is a blessing from God. It’s just his way of letting you realize he saved you from the wrong one.
If you start to miss me, remember: I didn’t walk away, you let me go.
And it only hurts when I’m breathing. My heart only breaks when it’s beating. My dreams only die when I’m dreaming. So, I hold my breath — to forget.
en_quotes.author: Shania Twain

en_quotes.quote: This time I wouldn’t forget him, because I couldn’t ever forgive him – for breaking my heart twice.
en_quotes.author: James Patterson

en_quotes.quote: Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you’d been before the fall.
en_quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

en_quotes.quote: The human heart has a way of making itself large again even after it’s been broken into a million pieces.
en_quotes.author: Robert James Waller

en_quotes.quote: I love you, but I hate you. I miss you, but I’m better off without you. I want you out of my life, but I never want to let you go.
en_quotes.author: Minhal Mehdi

en_quotes.quote: Some people are going to leave, but that’s not the end of your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.
en_quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

en_quotes.quote: Pain makes you stronger. Tears make you braver. Heartbreak makes you wiser.
en_quotes.author: Marc & Angel

en_quotes.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: He loved me. He loved me, but he doesn’t love me anymore, and it’s not the end of the world.
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

en_quotes.quote: You can’t have heartbreak without love. If your heart was really broken, then at least you know you really loved him.
en_quotes.author: Leila Sales

en_quotes.quote: It is strange how often a heart must be broken before the years can make it wise.
en_quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

en_quotes.quote: A girl doesn’t need anyone who doesn’t need her.
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only the love cannot last forever, but even the heartbreak is soon forgotten.
en_quotes.author: William Faulkner

en_quotes.quote: You didn’t break my heart; you freed it.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: I didn’t lose you. You lost me. You’ll search for me inside of everyone you’re with and I won’t be found.
en_quotes.author: R.H. Sin

en_quotes.quote: Each night I put my head to my pillow I try to tell myself I’m strong because I’ve gone one more day without you.
The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

en_quotes.quote: Nothing helps a broken heart like having someone wonderful give you theirs.
en_quotes.author: Rita Stradling

en_quotes.quote: Being heartbroken doesn’t mean you stop feeling. Just the opposite — it means you feel it all more
en_quotes.author: Julie Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities.
en_quotes.author: Patti Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse
